body_html: No need to tie nn and optim. Only require that optimizers are given named_parameters(). Thus, in optimizer.load_state_dict(), we can associate the right momentum cache with the right model parameter. Instead of associating by ordering, we'd now associate using parameter names.

body: No need to tie `nn` and `optim`. Only require that optimizers are given `named_parameters()`. Thus, in `optimizer.load_state_dict()`, we can associate the right momentum cache with the right model parameter. Instead of associating by ordering, we'd now associate using parameter names.
